name: textSize()
content:
Sets/gets the current font size. 

This size will be used in all subsequent calls to `text()`. Font size is measured in pixels and the default font size is 12 pixels. Text that does not fit completely within the display area will not be drawn or seen.

palette_params.name: pixels
palette_params.description: The number of pixels for the height of the text. Should be a positive number.

return_value: The current text size in pixels. Also changes future text output to the display.
